about.details:
Incorporated in December 2014, Ondoor Concepts is an e-commerce website catering to the needs of grocery and home essentials. In Jan 2015, the company opened its first store in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. As of 31st March 2023, the company has established 55 stores across various cities in Madhya Pradesh out of which 17 stores are owned and operated by the company. The rest of the 38 stores are operated through the franchisee model.

The company deals in the following product categories:

  • Food category includes groceries, fruits & vegetables, beverages dairy products and confectionery
  • Next comes FMCG i.e fast moving consumer goods involving personal care and toiletries and other over-the-counter products.
  • Lastly, general merchandise includes crockery, plastic items, daily necessities etc.

The competitive strength of the company includes:-

  1. E-tailing business including Android and IOS Application, web portal and telephonic orders backed up by backhand logistics to deliver the order at the customer's doorstep.
  2. Ondoor follows the policy of "Everyday Low Price" to give a convenient shopping experience to its target customer base.
  3. Reasonable pricing across all product categories and all product ranges rather than on particular day of the week.

faqs.question: What is the On Door Concepts IPO?
faqs.answer:
On Door Concepts IPO is a SME IPO of 1498800 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹31.18 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹208 per share. The minimum order quantity is 600.

The IPO opens on October 23, 2023, and closes on October 27, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in On Door Concepts IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in On Door Concepts IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in On Door Concepts IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in On Door Concepts IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'On Door Concepts IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When On Door Concepts IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The On Door Concepts IPO opens on October 23, 2023 and closes on October 27, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of On Door Concepts IPO?
faqs.answer: On Door Concepts IPO lot size is 600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,24,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for On Door Concepts IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in On Door Concepts IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is On Door Concepts IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for On Door Concepts IPO will be done on Tuesday, October 31, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, November 1, 2023. Check the On Door Concepts IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is On Door Concepts IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The On Door Concepts IPO listing date is on Wednesday, November 1, 2023.
